question: Which startup has won the NASSCOM Foundationâ€™s Social Innovation Forum (NSIF) award-2019?
explanation: Community-based tourism start-up NotOnMap (NoM), which has its head quarter in Himachal Pradesh\'s Chamba district, has won NASSCOM Foundation\'s Social Innovation Forum (NSIF) award. A total of 10 organisations were selected across different categories out of 1,500 applicants through a rigorous selection criteria and NoM emerged winner in \'other social innovation category\'.
